description: Information about the data files produced from single cells and results files produced from analysis workflows.
title: file

core.description: Type and schema for this object.

file_format.description: The format that the data file is in. Must be one of: fastq, fastq.gz, tiff, jpg, jpeg, png, txt, bam, cram, gtf, tar, tsv, csv.

filename.description: A filename for a data or results file. Must have a valid extension.
